properties.name: authorization-server.security.max-login-attempts
properties.description: The maximum login attempts a user can try before getting banned.

properties.name: tokenstore.datasource.url
properties.description: The url of the tokenstore-datasource used in development environments (postgresql).

properties.name: tokenstore.datasource.name
properties.description: The tokenstore-database name to connect to in development environments (postgresql).

properties.name: tokenstore.datasource.username
properties.description: The username used to connect to the tokenstore-datasource in development environments (postgresql).

properties.name: tokenstore.datasource.password
properties.description: The password used to connect to the tokenstore-datasource in development environments (postgresql).

properties.name: tokenstore.datasource.driver-class-name
properties.description: The driver class used to connect to the tokenstore-datasource in development environments (postgresql).
